7// Surface.cpp: Implements the egl::Surface class, representing a drawing surface
8// such as the client area of a window, including any back buffers.
9// Implements EGLSurface and related functionality. [EGL 1.4] section 2.2 page 3.
10
11#include "libANGLE/Surface.h"
12
13#include <EGL/eglext.h>
14
15#include "libANGLE/Config.h"
16#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
17#include "libANGLE/Display.h"
18#include "libANGLE/Framebuffer.h"
19#include "libANGLE/Texture.h"
20#include "libANGLE/Thread.h"
21#include "libANGLE/formatutils.h"
22#include "libANGLE/renderer/EGLImplFactory.h"
23#include "libANGLE/trace.h"
24
25namespace egl
26{
27namespace
28{
29angle::SubjectIndex kSurfaceImplSubjectIndex = 0;
30} // namespace
31
32SurfaceState::SurfaceState(const egl::Config *configIn, const AttributeMap &attributesIn)
33 : label(nullptr),
34 config((configIn != nullptr) ? new egl::Config(*configIn) : nullptr),
35 attributes(attributesIn),
36 timestampsEnabled(false),
37 directComposition(false)
38{
39 directComposition = attributes.get(EGL_DIRECT_COMPOSITION_ANGLE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE;
40}
41
42SurfaceState::~SurfaceState()
43{
44 delete config;
45}
46
47bool SurfaceState::isRobustResourceInitEnabled() const
48{
49 return attributes.get(EGL_ROBUST_RESOURCE_INITIALIZATION_ANGLE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE;
50}
51
52Surface::Surface(EGLint surfaceType,
53 const egl::Config *config,
54 const AttributeMap &attributes,
55 EGLenum buftype)
56 : FramebufferAttachmentObject(),
57 mState(config, attributes),
58 mImplementation(nullptr),
59 mRefCount(0),
60 mDestroyed(false),
61 mType(surfaceType),
62 mBuftype(buftype),
63 mPostSubBufferRequested(false),
64 mLargestPbuffer(false),
65 mGLColorspace(EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_LINEAR),
66 mVGAlphaFormat(EGL_VG_ALPHA_FORMAT_NONPRE),
67 mVGColorspace(EGL_VG_COLORSPACE_sRGB),
68 mMipmapTexture(false),
69 mMipmapLevel(0),
70 mHorizontalResolution(EGL_UNKNOWN),
71 mVerticalResolution(EGL_UNKNOWN),
72 mMultisampleResolve(EGL_MULTISAMPLE_RESOLVE_DEFAULT),
73 mFixedSize(false),
74 mFixedWidth(0),
75 mFixedHeight(0),
76 mTextureFormat(TextureFormat::NoTexture),
77 mTextureTarget(EGL_NO_TEXTURE),
78 // FIXME: Determine actual pixel aspect ratio
79 mPixelAspectRatio(static_cast<EGLint>(1.0 * EGL_DISPLAY_SCALING)),
80 mRenderBuffer(EGL_BACK_BUFFER),
81 mSwapBehavior(EGL_NONE),
82 mOrientation(0),
83 mTexture(nullptr),
84 mColorFormat(config->renderTargetFormat),
85 mDSFormat(config->depthStencilFormat),
86 mInitState(gl::InitState::Initialized),
87 mImplObserverBinding(this, kSurfaceImplSubjectIndex)
88{
89 mPostSubBufferRequested =
90 (attributes.get(EGL_POST_SUB_BUFFER_SUPPORTED_NV, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE);
91 mFlexibleSurfaceCompatibilityRequested =
92 (attributes.get(EGL_FLEXIBLE_SURFACE_COMPATIBILITY_SUPPORTED_ANGLE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE);
93
94 if (mType == EGL_PBUFFER_BIT)
95 {
96 mLargestPbuffer = (attributes.get(EGL_LARGEST_PBUFFER, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE);
97 }
98
99 if (mType == EGL_PIXMAP_BIT)
100 {
101 mRenderBuffer = EGL_SINGLE_BUFFER;
102 }
103
104 mGLColorspace =
105 static_cast<EGLenum>(attributes.get(EGL_GL_COLORSPACE, EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_LINEAR));
106 mVGAlphaFormat =
107 static_cast<EGLenum>(attributes.get(EGL_VG_ALPHA_FORMAT, EGL_VG_ALPHA_FORMAT_NONPRE));
108 mVGColorspace = static_cast<EGLenum>(attributes.get(EGL_VG_COLORSPACE, EGL_VG_COLORSPACE_sRGB));
109 mMipmapTexture = (attributes.get(EGL_MIPMAP_TEXTURE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE);
110
111 mRobustResourceInitialization =
112 (attributes.get(EGL_ROBUST_RESOURCE_INITIALIZATION_ANGLE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE);
113 if (mRobustResourceInitialization)
114 {
115 mInitState = gl::InitState::MayNeedInit;
116 }
117
118 mFixedSize = (attributes.get(EGL_FIXED_SIZE_ANGLE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE);
119 if (mFixedSize)
120 {
121 mFixedWidth = static_cast<size_t>(attributes.get(EGL_WIDTH, 0));
122 mFixedHeight = static_cast<size_t>(attributes.get(EGL_HEIGHT, 0));
123 }
124
125 if (mType != EGL_WINDOW_BIT)
126 {
127 mTextureFormat = attributes.getAsPackedEnum(EGL_TEXTURE_FORMAT, TextureFormat::NoTexture);
128 mTextureTarget = static_cast<EGLenum>(attributes.get(EGL_TEXTURE_TARGET, EGL_NO_TEXTURE));
129 }
130
131 mOrientation = static_cast<EGLint>(attributes.get(EGL_SURFACE_ORIENTATION_ANGLE, 0));
132
133 mTextureOffset.x = static_cast<int>(mState.attributes.get(EGL_TEXTURE_OFFSET_X_ANGLE, 0));
134 mTextureOffset.y = static_cast<int>(mState.attributes.get(EGL_TEXTURE_OFFSET_Y_ANGLE, 0));
135}
136
137Surface::~Surface() {}
138
139rx::FramebufferAttachmentObjectImpl *Surface::getAttachmentImpl() const
140{
141 return mImplementation;
142}
143
144Error Surface::destroyImpl(const Display *display)
145{
146 if (mImplementation)
147 {
148 mImplementation->destroy(display);
149 }
150
151 ASSERT(!mTexture);
152
153 SafeDelete(mImplementation);
154
155 delete this;
156 return NoError();
157}
158
159void Surface::postSwap(const gl::Context *context)
160{
161 if (mRobustResourceInitialization && mSwapBehavior != EGL_BUFFER_PRESERVED)
162 {
163 mInitState = gl::InitState::MayNeedInit;
164 onStateChange(angle::SubjectMessage::SubjectChanged);
165 }
166}
167
168Error Surface::initialize(const Display *display)
169{
170 GLenum overrideRenderTargetFormat = mState.config->renderTargetFormat;
171
172 // To account for color space differences, override the renderTargetFormat with the
173 // non-linear format. If no suitable non-linear format was found, return
174 // EGL_BAD_MATCH error
175 if (!gl::ColorspaceFormatOverride(mGLColorspace, &overrideRenderTargetFormat))
176 {
177 return egl::EglBadMatch();
178 }
179
180 // If an override is required update mState.config as well
181 if (mState.config->renderTargetFormat != overrideRenderTargetFormat)
182 {
183 egl::Config *overrideConfig = new egl::Config(*(mState.config));
184 overrideConfig->renderTargetFormat = overrideRenderTargetFormat;
185 delete mState.config;
186 mState.config = overrideConfig;
187
188 mColorFormat = gl::Format(mState.config->renderTargetFormat);
189 mDSFormat = gl::Format(mState.config->depthStencilFormat);
190 }
191
192 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->initialize(display));
193
194 // Initialized here since impl is nullptr in the constructor.
195 // Must happen after implementation initialize for Android.
196 mSwapBehavior = mImplementation->getSwapBehavior();
197
198 if (mBuftype == EGL_IOSURFACE_ANGLE)
199 {
200 GLenum internalFormat =
201 static_cast<GLenum>(mState.attributes.get(EGL_TEXTURE_INTERNAL_FORMAT_ANGLE));
202 GLenum type = static_cast<GLenum>(mState.attributes.get(EGL_TEXTURE_TYPE_ANGLE));
203 mColorFormat = gl::Format(internalFormat, type);
204 }
205 if (mBuftype == EGL_D3D_TEXTURE_ANGLE)
206 {
207 const angle::Format *colorFormat = mImplementation->getD3DTextureColorFormat();
208 ASSERT(colorFormat != nullptr);
209 GLenum internalFormat = colorFormat->fboImplementationInternalFormat;
210 mColorFormat = gl::Format(internalFormat, colorFormat->componentType);
211 mGLColorspace = EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_LINEAR;
212 if (mColorFormat.info->colorEncoding == GL_SRGB)
213 {
214 mGLColorspace = EGL_GL_COLORSPACE_SRGB;
215 }
216 }
217
218 if (mType == EGL_WINDOW_BIT && display->getExtensions().getFrameTimestamps)
219 {
220 mState.supportedCompositorTimings = mImplementation->getSupportedCompositorTimings();
221 mState.supportedTimestamps = mImplementation->getSupportedTimestamps();
222 }
223
224 mImplObserverBinding.bind(mImplementation);
225
226 return NoError();
227}
228
229Error Surface::makeCurrent(const gl::Context *context)
230{
231 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->makeCurrent(context));
232
233 mRefCount++;
234 return NoError();
235}
236
237Error Surface::unMakeCurrent(const gl::Context *context)
238{
239 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->unMakeCurrent(context));
240 return releaseRef(context->getDisplay());
241}
242
243Error Surface::releaseRef(const Display *display)
244{
245 ASSERT(mRefCount > 0);
246 mRefCount--;
247 if (mRefCount == 0 && mDestroyed)
248 {
249 ASSERT(display);
250 return destroyImpl(display);
251 }
252
253 return NoError();
254}
255
256Error Surface::onDestroy(const Display *display)
257{
258 mDestroyed = true;
259 if (mRefCount == 0)
260 {
261 return destroyImpl(display);
262 }
263 return NoError();
264}
265
266void Surface::setLabel(EGLLabelKHR label)
267{
268 mState.label = label;
269}
270
271EGLLabelKHR Surface::getLabel() const
272{
273 return mState.label;
274}
275
276EGLint Surface::getType() const
277{
278 return mType;
279}
280
281Error Surface::swap(const gl::Context *context)
282{
283 ANGLE_TRACE_EVENT0("gpu.angle", "egl::Surface::swap");
284 context->onPreSwap();
285
286 context->getState().getOverlay()->onSwap();
287
288 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->swap(context));
289 postSwap(context);
290 return NoError();
291}
292
293Error Surface::swapWithDamage(const gl::Context *context, EGLint *rects, EGLint n_rects)
294{
295 context->getState().getOverlay()->onSwap();
296
297 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->swapWithDamage(context, rects, n_rects));
298 postSwap(context);
299 return NoError();
300}
301
302Error Surface::swapWithFrameToken(const gl::Context *context, EGLFrameTokenANGLE frameToken)
303{
304 context->getState().getOverlay()->onSwap();
305
306 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->swapWithFrameToken(context, frameToken));
307 postSwap(context);
308 return NoError();
309}
310
311Error Surface::postSubBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
312 EGLint x,
313 EGLint y,
314 EGLint width,
315 EGLint height)
316{
317 if (width == 0 || height == 0)
318 {
319 return egl::NoError();
320 }
321
322 context->getState().getOverlay()->onSwap();
323
324 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->postSubBuffer(context, x, y, width, height));
325 postSwap(context);
326 return NoError();
327}
328
329Error Surface::setPresentationTime(EGLnsecsANDROID time)
330{
331 return mImplementation->setPresentationTime(time);
332}
333
334Error Surface::querySurfacePointerANGLE(EGLint attribute, void **value)
335{
336 return mImplementation->querySurfacePointerANGLE(attribute, value);
337}
338
339EGLint Surface::isPostSubBufferSupported() const
340{
341 return mPostSubBufferRequested && mImplementation->isPostSubBufferSupported();
342}

344void Surface::setSwapInterval(EGLint interval)
345{
346 mImplementation->setSwapInterval(interval);
347}

349void Surface::setMipmapLevel(EGLint level)
350{
351 // Level is set but ignored
352 UNIMPLEMENTED();
353 mMipmapLevel = level;
354}

356void Surface::setMultisampleResolve(EGLenum resolve)
357{
358 // Behaviour is set but ignored
359 UNIMPLEMENTED();
360 mMultisampleResolve = resolve;
361}
362
363void Surface::setSwapBehavior(EGLenum behavior)
364{
365 // Behaviour is set but ignored
366 UNIMPLEMENTED();
367 mSwapBehavior = behavior;
368}
369
370void Surface::setFixedWidth(EGLint width)
371{
372 mFixedWidth = width;
373 mImplementation->setFixedWidth(width);
374}
375
376void Surface::setFixedHeight(EGLint height)
377{
378 mFixedHeight = height;
379 mImplementation->setFixedHeight(height);
380}

461
462EGLint Surface::getWidth() const
463{
464 return mFixedSize ? static_cast<EGLint>(mFixedWidth) : mImplementation->getWidth();
465}
466
467EGLint Surface::getHeight() const
468{
469 return mFixedSize ? static_cast<EGLint>(mFixedHeight) : mImplementation->getHeight();
470}
471
472egl::Error Surface::getUserWidth(const egl::Display *display, EGLint *value) const
473{
474 if (mFixedSize)
475 {
476 *value = static_cast<EGLint>(mFixedWidth);
477 return NoError();
478 }
479 else
480 {
481 return mImplementation->getUserWidth(display, value);
482 }
483}
484
485egl::Error Surface::getUserHeight(const egl::Display *display, EGLint *value) const
486{
487 if (mFixedSize)
488 {
489 *value = static_cast<EGLint>(mFixedHeight);
490 return NoError();
491 }
492 else
493 {
494 return mImplementation->getUserHeight(display, value);
495 }
496}
497
498Error Surface::bindTexImage(gl::Context *context, gl::Texture *texture, EGLint buffer)
499{
500 ASSERT(!mTexture);
501 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->bindTexImage(context, texture, buffer));
502
503 if (texture->bindTexImageFromSurface(context, this) == angle::Result::Stop)
504 {
505 return Error(EGL_BAD_SURFACE);
506 }
507 mTexture = texture;
508 mRefCount++;
509
510 return NoError();
511}
512
513Error Surface::releaseTexImage(const gl::Context *context, EGLint buffer)
514{
515 ASSERT(context);
516
517 ANGLE_TRY(mImplementation->releaseTexImage(context, buffer));
518
519 ASSERT(mTexture);
520 ANGLE_TRY(ResultToEGL(mTexture->releaseTexImageFromSurface(context)));
521
522 return releaseTexImageFromTexture(context);
523}
524
525Error Surface::getSyncValues(EGLuint64KHR *ust, EGLuint64KHR *msc, EGLuint64KHR *sbc)
526{
527 return mImplementation->getSyncValues(ust, msc, sbc);
528}
529
530Error Surface::getMscRate(EGLint *numerator, EGLint *denominator)
531{
532 return mImplementation->getMscRate(numerator, denominator);
533}
534
535Error Surface::releaseTexImageFromTexture(const gl::Context *context)
536{
537 ASSERT(mTexture);
538 mTexture = nullptr;
539 return releaseRef(context->getDisplay());
540}
541
542gl::Extents Surface::getAttachmentSize(const gl::ImageIndex & /*target*/) const
543{
544 return gl::Extents(getWidth(), getHeight(), 1);
545}
546
547gl::Format Surface::getAttachmentFormat(GLenum binding, const gl::ImageIndex &target) const
548{
549 return (binding == GL_BACK ? mColorFormat : mDSFormat);
550}
551
552GLsizei Surface::getAttachmentSamples(const gl::ImageIndex &target) const
553{
554 return getConfig()->samples;
555}
556
557bool Surface::isRenderable(const gl::Context *context,
558 GLenum binding,
559 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex) const
560{
561 return true;
562}
563
564GLuint Surface::getId() const
565{
566 UNREACHABLE();
567 return 0;
568}
569
570gl::Framebuffer *Surface::createDefaultFramebuffer(const gl::Context *context,
571 egl::Surface *readSurface)
572{
573 return new gl::Framebuffer(context, this, readSurface);
574}
575
576gl::InitState Surface::initState(const gl::ImageIndex & /*imageIndex*/) const
577{
578 return mInitState;
579}
580
581void Surface::setInitState(const gl::ImageIndex & /*imageIndex*/, gl::InitState initState)
582{
583 mInitState = initState;
584}
585
586void Surface::setTimestampsEnabled(bool enabled)
587{
588 mImplementation->setTimestampsEnabled(enabled);
589 mState.timestampsEnabled = enabled;
590}
591
592bool Surface::isTimestampsEnabled() const
593{
594 return mState.timestampsEnabled;
595}
596
597const SupportedCompositorTiming &Surface::getSupportedCompositorTimings() const
598{
599 return mState.supportedCompositorTimings;
600}
601
602Error Surface::getCompositorTiming(EGLint numTimestamps,
603 const EGLint *names,
604 EGLnsecsANDROID *values) const
605{
606 return mImplementation->getCompositorTiming(numTimestamps, names, values);
607}
608
609Error Surface::getNextFrameId(EGLuint64KHR *frameId) const
610{
611 return mImplementation->getNextFrameId(frameId);
612}
613
614const SupportedTimestamps &Surface::getSupportedTimestamps() const
615{
616 return mState.supportedTimestamps;
617}
618
619Error Surface::getFrameTimestamps(EGLuint64KHR frameId,
620 EGLint numTimestamps,
621 const EGLint *timestamps,
622 EGLnsecsANDROID *values) const
623{
624 return mImplementation->getFrameTimestamps(frameId, numTimestamps, timestamps, values);
625}
626
627void Surface::onSubjectStateChange(angle::SubjectIndex index, angle::SubjectMessage message)
628{
629 ASSERT(index == kSurfaceImplSubjectIndex);
630 switch (message)
631 {
632 case angle::SubjectMessage::SubjectChanged:
633 onStateChange(angle::SubjectMessage::ContentsChanged);
634 break;
635 case angle::SubjectMessage::SurfaceChanged:
636 onStateChange(angle::SubjectMessage::SurfaceChanged);
637 break;
638 default:
639 UNREACHABLE();
640 break;
641 }
642}
643
644WindowSurface::WindowSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
645 const egl::Config *config,
646 EGLNativeWindowType window,
647 const AttributeMap &attribs)
648 : Surface(EGL_WINDOW_BIT, config, attribs)
649{
650 mImplementation = implFactory->createWindowSurface(mState, window, attribs);
651}
652
653WindowSurface::~WindowSurface() {}
654
655PbufferSurface::PbufferSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
656 const Config *config,
657 const AttributeMap &attribs)
658 : Surface(EGL_PBUFFER_BIT, config, attribs)
659{
660 mImplementation = implFactory->createPbufferSurface(mState, attribs);
661}
662
663PbufferSurface::PbufferSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
664 const Config *config,
665 EGLenum buftype,
666 EGLClientBuffer clientBuffer,
667 const AttributeMap &attribs)
668 : Surface(EGL_PBUFFER_BIT, config, attribs, buftype)
669{
670 mImplementation =
671 implFactory->createPbufferFromClientBuffer(mState, buftype, clientBuffer, attribs);
672}
673
674PbufferSurface::~PbufferSurface() {}
675
676PixmapSurface::PixmapSurface(rx::EGLImplFactory *implFactory,
677 const Config *config,
678 NativePixmapType nativePixmap,
679 const AttributeMap &attribs)
680 : Surface(EGL_PIXMAP_BIT, config, attribs)
681{
682 mImplementation = implFactory->createPixmapSurface(mState, nativePixmap, attribs);
683}
684
685PixmapSurface::~PixmapSurface() {}
686
687// SurfaceDeleter implementation.
688
689SurfaceDeleter::SurfaceDeleter(const Display *display) : mDisplay(display) {}
690
691SurfaceDeleter::~SurfaceDeleter() {}
692
693void SurfaceDeleter::operator()(Surface *surface)
694{
695 ANGLE_SWALLOW_ERR(surface->onDestroy(mDisplay));
696}
